title: Chapter 4526 - Chapter 4526: Stand By, 4525
body:
Chapter 4526 - Chapter 4526: Stand By, 4525

Chapter 4526: Stand by, 4525

“Land of origin? Where’s the Dragon Palace Alliance?”

The Alliance leader of the Justice Alliance murmured and frowned!

“Alliance leader, Will the evil array faction attack the Dragon Palace Alliance? With their strength, the Dragon Palace Alliance won’t be able to stop them!”

An expert at the Great Dao realm couldn’t help but say!

“Nothing good will happen if they go to the Dragon Palace Alliance.”

The Alliance Master Thought for a while and said, “Contact the Dragon Palace Alliance and tell them about this. Also, tell them that we’re willing to help if the Dragon Palace Alliance is invaded!”

“Yes, Alliance Master!”

The experts of the Justice Alliance nodded slightly.

They understood what the alliance master meant.

The appearance of the Dragon Palace Alliance was beneficial to the Justice Alliance.

The Justice Alliance had always wanted to form an alliance with the Dragon Palace Alliance.

Once they formed an alliance, they would be completely unafraid of the evil sequence faction.

However, the last alliance was rejected by the Dragon Palace Alliance!

This time, they first passed the news to the Dragon Palace Alliance.

If the Dragon Palace Alliance was really invaded, the Justice Alliance would be willing to help.

This was because the evil sequence faction was stronger. If the Dragon Palace Alliance was really destroyed, then the evil sequence faction would receive a huge increase in strength.

At that time, they would face the evil sequence faction alone.

Therefore, the Dragon Palace Alliance could not be destroyed!

“Keep an eye on the evil sequence faction. If they really attack, wait for the Dragon Palace to speak First!”

“Isn’t little song in the land of origin? Keep in touch with him!”

The leader of the Justice Alliance continued to instruct.

Even if the evil sequence faction really wanted to destroy the Dragon Palace Alliance, the Dragon Palace Alliance’s strength was enough to hold on until their reinforcements arrived.

Therefore, they wouldn’t take the initiative to help. They would wait for the Dragon Palace to send out a request for help!

This way, the Dragon Palace Alliance would be even more grateful!

“HMM?”

At the same time, in the Dragon Palace of the nine-origin universe.

Not long after, Wang Xian received a message from Prime Minister Gui and a reminder from the Justice Alliance!

“Reply and thank the Justice Alliance for their reminder. Our Dragon Palace Alliance will be prepared.”

Wang Xian instructed Prime Minister Gui.

“It’s the Dragon King!”

Prime Minister Gui nodded.

Wang Xian remembered the goodwill of the Justice Alliance.

He moved his palm and converted the power of chaos into divination power.

“1,500 years!”

Very soon, he obtained a vague time.

1,500 years later, the powerhouses from the evil sequence faction would rush over!

“I can’t absorb the resources either. However, the impact isn’t too great. It shouldn’t be too much of a problem for the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens to recover to the primal Chaos Realm!”

Wang Xian mumbled.

Although the realm of the experts from the Dragon Palace was a little low, the dragon palace had more than enough treasures in the Tianyuan blessed realm.

There were more than ten of them.

With more than ten treasures in the Tianyuan blessed realm, the strength of the experts from the Dragon Palace would increase by a lot.

Over a thousand years passed quickly as they continued to absorb resources.

Meanwhile, the Justice Alliance had confirmed that the goal of the powerhouses from the evil sequence camp was the land of origin.

“We are only a few more decades away!”

In the Dragon Palace, Wang Xian opened his eyes and muttered.

He looked to the side. The Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens had recovered a portion of its strength.

It was enough to resist a chaos-level existence.

At this moment, Prime Minister Gui sent an urgent message through the communication device of the Dragon Palace Alliance!

“All the experts of the Dragon Palace Alliance, gather in the Dragon Palace base and come here immediately!”

The urgent message was sent to every expert.

The land of origin had been unified by the Dragon Palace. Besides the experts of the Dragon Palace, the Dragon Palace Alliance now had eight Heavenly Yuan realm experts.

The number of the remaining experts was around 180.

This was all the strength of the Dragon Palace Alliance.

Of course, if the strength of the Dragon Palace was added in, there would be more than 280.

This number of Heavenly Yuan blessed realm experts was already very high.

The Justice Alliance only had more than 300 heavenly yuan blessed realm experts.

The reason why there were so many Dragon Palace alliances was because of the Dragon Palace.

After all, the Dragon Palace alone had hundreds of heavenly yuan blessed realm powerhouses.

“What happened?”

“I don’t know. Prime Minister Gui sent an urgent message and asked all the powerhouses to come here. Something big must have happened. Otherwise, he wouldn’t be in such a hurry for us to come here.”

“Is Our Dragon Palace Alliance in Trouble?”

All the powerhouses flew toward the base of the Dragon Palace Alliance. They couldn’t help but ask when they saw the members who were rushing over.

Their faces were filled with astonishment.

This was the first time such an emergency gathering had happened!

Not long after, more than a hundred experts and most of the experts from the surrounding universes had arrived.

There were still some who hadn’t arrived. They were either in seclusion or in distant places.

When almost everyone had arrived, Prime Minister Gui walked in.

“Prime Minister Gui, is something wrong?”

The three great prophets of the divination universe had all arrived.

After arriving, they did divination, but they were unable to divine any information.

However, they had a vague feeling that something bad had happened!

“According to the information we received, all the experts from the evil sequence camp are rushing towards us. They don’t come with good intentions!”

Prime Minister Gui said!

“What?”

“How dare those experts from the evil sequence faction come to us? Damn them!”

“With our strength and the Dragon King’s presence, we might be able to resist the evil sequence faction.”

“These damn beasts want to attack the Dragon Palace Alliance?”

The experts from the Dragon Palace Alliance were full of anger.

“Don’t worry. All the experts can gather here. The Dragon King is free to make the arrangements!”

Prime Minister Gui said to them with a smile.

He wasn’t worried at all.

“HMM? is the Dragon King prepared?”

“With the Dragon King here, it won’t be easy for the evil array camp to deal with us!”

“That’s right. The Dragon King is at the primal chaos realm, and he’s not an ordinary primal chaos realm expert.”

“If the evil sequence faction dares to invade us, we will let them know the strength of our Dragon Palace Alliance!”

Seeing Prime Minister Gui’s smile and not the slightest bit of nervousness, everyone heaved a sigh of relief in their hearts.

The name of a man, the shadow of a tree.

The evil sequence faction, they were still very fearful!

Towards the evil sequence faction, every expert was filled with killing intent and hatred.

Even among the current champions of the Dragon Palace Alliance, there were those who had been wiped out by the evil sequence faction!
